website_summaries.verdict: The Olive & Dove RemoCam tries to do a lot, but its outdated features can't compete with what's available today.
pros: Olive & Dove's $199 RemoCam gives you flexibility with both local and cloud storage options
cons: While I successfully turned on a TV with the RemoCam's infrared remote function, the feature is outdated
RemoCam doesn't work with any smart home platforms
Its app design and night-vision view could use some work, too

customer_reviews.title: Great value, quality and support
customer_reviews.text: The quality, features and the customer support are excellent. We really like the ability to listen in to video footage, capture to the cloud at a reasonable cost < $4.00/ month and how the camera's night vision and resolution perform. I looked at the top cameras that most reviewers look at and glad i steered away from the herd in this instance. The support is excellent too as when i called up and did not leave a message, someone called right back. After a couple of back and forth emails calls, we were able to customize this to our situation.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: On site capability a must.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to monitor a property out of state. Set up fairly easily. Worked great for about two weeks and then stopped. Internet and power is up and resigned into app as instructed and still no response. So, spent a lot of money to monitor a property for two weeks. No way to work on it remotely. Not recommended if you don’t have on site capability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid home security camera
customer_reviews.text: Remocam really works well. I can monitor my kid when she plays in her room and communicate with her using the 2 way audio feature. When my wife does not answer her phone, I use the siren alarm to communicate with her as well, which really works. It's a sold home security camera that does more than security. It can control your home electronics devices such as TV, portable AC or an IR light bulb even you are away from home using the app. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Techlover

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: The camera stopped working after 2 years. The camera won’t power on anymore. For 200 dollars plus taxes it should last longer than that. I have other cameras that I brought around the same time as this one but they are still going strong. I wouldn’t recommend this product. The audio was so so and the video subpar.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT JAMES

customer_reviews.title: The night vision is really clear and I like using the 2-way audio to communicate with my kids ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this camera for 2 weeks. Installation went smooth without using any cable other than power cord. The night vision is really clear and I like using the 2-way audio to communicate with my kids while I'm at work. The Smart Home feature is very unique and convenient as well. I don't have to look for the TV remote as I can just use my iPhone. Browsing through the app and controlling the camera is also easy. It's a great camera!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great home security solution!
customer_reviews.text: After using it for two weeks, Remocam is a great multi-functional home security device at an excellent entry-level price. It is much more than a security camera alone; yet the mobile app is intuitive and easy to use. Setup couldn't be simpler. By being able to speak, listen, and turn on TVs in line-of-sight, Remocam puts in you your room from anywhere in the world. Highly recommended especially with the very low overhead investment.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis T

customer_reviews.title: POOR PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: good idea, bad product. Camera will not recognize an of 4 wi fi routers we have. Customer service is non existent,they have short hours and I can only leave a voice mail. After days of trying and calling during their hours no return call ever happened. I honestly cannot believe Amazon rated this system number one ! who paid them off ? What good is a product you ant use ? Funny too how the brackets ship in 3-4 weeks ! this thing is table top or shelf, some security ! they prob would steal the camera. DONT BUY, unless you seek a world of frustrations and returns
customer_reviews.author: Doc Eisenmann

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money-feature rich
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Remocam to watch my 92 year old mother while at work, I was surprised at how well the quality of the videos were and the ability to pan and zoom around the room was awesome. I wish they had an IPad app but the features all work well. I hear they have a video door bell and that is going to be my next order when available.
customer_reviews.author: Charles C LaRocca

customer_reviews.title: it worked good for 2 weeks if so
customer_reviews.text: This works ok. The majority of the time it will not work at all. I have this product for 6 months.. it worked good for 2 weeks if so..
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to set up - just as video shows ...
customer_reviews.text: This rocks! Super easy to set up - just as video shows - and is very clear on my iPhone and I am thinking of ordering another one! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost....can only get better
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little device. Will get better over time, but 5 stars for innovation and design. Software needs to allow user selectable TOD or Time of Day event recording, to filter out unwanted alerts.
customer_reviews.author: R C P

customer_reviews.title: Limited security benefit.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box remo was easy to setup and conecct to wifi. Camera has limited definition beyond 15' day or night. I tested on my IPhone 5 only. a larger format my give different result.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Greene

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up. Love the ability to check in and see what is going on. It's very helpful to be able to pan across the room and down the hall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't even deserve any star. Disappointed. Bought many things from Amazon. This is biggest disappointment. Got it set up. Worked fine for 2 days. Then sound sent. Then blurry. Then it stopped working all together. Worked hours to fix it. Support closes at 4:30 pm. I work as most people do. I work until 7 pm. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: com and so far I'm satisfied with the camera
customer_reviews.text: Recently I moved to new house and was looking for camera to protect my house, so I purchased this product after reading a review from securitygem.com and so far I'm satisfied with the camera! The camera works great- the video feed is clear and I like being able to access the Cloud videos from the app. Installation was very simple and straightforward. My kids love Remocam more than I do, especially the "Speak and Listen" function and live feed. It's a great gadget to play with my kids and protect my home.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great fun.
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what is was made to do. I may get one for another room. Great fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Allen

customer_reviews.title: Had this for a few months now
customer_reviews.text: Super easy set up, great video quality. I can control my TV and other devices even I'm away from home via IR remote control feature. Great IoT security camera!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea, but useful only as a static billiard ...
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. There is no way to know if the Remocam is on or not on. The "QR scanning" feature to activate the Remocam does not work. Nice idea, but useful only as a static billiard ball. I don't know who the homers are who gave this a 5 star review, but it goes back to Amazon tomorrow morning. Terrible, useless product. And, yes, I am real user not one of the 5 Five-star shills.
customer_reviews.author: Bookwine

customer_reviews.title: Not just a great product but tge customer service is AMAZING! ! !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 units as housewarming presents for my two siblings. They abilities that the Remocam has vs my product are amazing. My product is not an IOT so the Remocam is lightyears ahead of my product in my home. The ability to converse back and forth is great. The ability to move the camera is another plus . My siblings love their units and I can take comfort in knowing that they and my nieces and nephews are safe. The entire experience from purchasing the units and receiving a thank you card to very prompt and polite customer service has my family sold on Remocam and can wait to see what the future holds for this company.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Lujan

customer_reviews.title: a little large but works well
customer_reviews.text: I found this camera very easy to install, and I like the interaction with my phone and other devices. I've had an issue with maintenance in my apartment, and this is a nice way to track things happening when I am not at home. The only negative is that it is quite a bit larger than I expected. I suspect perhaps that this device might be designed for a business or out of doors where one may want a deterrent. but for in an apartment, I'd prefer it to be a little more subtle and less obvious. Other than that, it's a very nice and useful device.
customer_reviews.author: Melkor

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind and much more!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first home security cam and I love it! Unpacked it a week ago and the initial setup could not be any easier. HD picture quality using the iPhone app is impressive! Tilt and panning features come in very handy when checking in on our dog. Kids get a kick when I check in on them from work and speak to them through the mic. I haven't turned on the motion sensor feature yet b/c I still need to get a micro sd card. It's only been several days but it's already surpassed my expectations! I now get the peace of mind that I've been wanting when we go away on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Generally a serviceable product. Connection can be spotty at times. Like that the camera swivels so different angles can be captured. Would like to see this product have a timing feature when the sensor can be activated. For instance, I'd like to be able to turn the sensor on and off at certain preset times. There is a slight lag time when talking through the Remocam; remember to hold the talk button during the entire time you are talking. It runs on an AC adapter, so it doesn't need to be charged.
customer_reviews.author: Edubbiey

customer_reviews.title: EDIT: Remocam tech support is helpful, but device still isn't working...
customer_reviews.text: The Remocam seems pretty ideal for all of its functionality that it boasts to have, and that obviously others have experienced... but mine has not worked yet. The initial setup through my phone (Samsung Galaxy Note 4) will not go past the network connection. It just keeps failing, and that's pretty suspect for an item that costs this much. EDIT: I have heard back from Remocam in regards to this issue and while they've been very helpful and even sent me another device to test, it still won't work in my home. I'm not happy about that, but at least Remocam has been very helpful in their attempts. Caveat emptor, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: The Blue Thunder Bomb

customer_reviews.title: but the smart home compatibility really helps tie the device together with ...
customer_reviews.text: Remocam exceed expectations. The design, functionality, and unique features make this a no-brainer. Not only does it work as an overall security camera, but the smart home compatibility really helps tie the device together with my other products.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Smart Camera
customer_reviews.text: Item works well, the camera to phone sync is not quite up to par however I am still figuring it out. It tends to record pictures of the area at virtually any and sometimes no movement whatsoever. I have received updates on the phone app, showing 30 plus pics with nothing recorded. Shadows seem to set it off. I will post a new , updated review as I filter the pros and cons of this camera and become (hopefully) more adept at using it.
customer_reviews.author: Chet Ragsdale

product_meta.title: Remocam RMCU-1508 Smart Home Security Camera, HD, PTZ, Wireless, Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, IP Surveillance
product_meta.description:
Style:Camera

RemoCam is the first security camera with a patent-pending infrared Smart Home technology. It monitors your place with excellent HD live streaming and motion sensor recordings, and controls your electronic devices using the Smart Home feature. Monitor your home with complete security and convenience. 



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
feature_bullets: Smart home capability to connect devices such as lights, tv, media player, and portable a/c and heater
Hd live feed and videos, 2-way communication, pan 335 and tilt 95, take pictures and videos
Motion sensor with push notifications, siren alarm, emergency calls, infrared night vision
Quick 1 minute setup using our intuitive Remocam app
Either cloud and local recording with bank-level encryption to protect your personal data

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars61 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
